  • com.apusplay.sdk使用的com.apusplay.sdk中的类 
    类和说明
    AccessToken 
    ApusPlaySdk
    This is a simplified class to use the Apus Play SDK, exposing most useful methods to developers.
    ApusPlaySdk.StatisticLog 
    CallBackResult
    This is base class for the result of ICallBack.
    ICallBack 
    InitConfig 
    RequestCallBack
    Generic call back for request
    RequestResult
    This is for most request circumstance of call back.
    SdkConfig 
    SdkStatusCode
    The status code used in the Apus Play SDK.
    UserProfile
    This is user information structure.
    UserRequestResult
    User information request result.
  • com.apusplay.sdk.auth使用的com.apusplay.sdk中的类 
    类和说明
    ICallBack 
    UserProfile
    This is user information structure.
  • com.apusplay.sdk.exception使用的com.apusplay.sdk中的类 
    类和说明
    ApusPlayException
    Represents an error condition specific to the Apus Play SDK for Android.
  • com.apusplay.sdk.pay使用的com.apusplay.sdk中的类

    This is base class for the result of ICallBack.

    RequestResult
    This is for most request circumstance of call back.
